description: Radicchio leaves are sturdy enough to stand up to blanching and filling, but use caution: they are still more delicate than, say, cabbage leaves Their bitter flavor makes a nice contrast to this nutty ricotta filling.
title: Radicchio Rolls With Ricotta and Walnuts
title_page: Radicchio Rolls With Ricotta and Walnuts Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Radicchio leaves are sturdy enough to stand up to blanching and filling, but use caution: they are still more delicate than, say, cabbage leaves. Their bitter flavor makes a nice contrast to this nutty ricotta filling.
Featured in: Just DonÂ’T Call Them Weeds.
